'''Vertigo Entertainment''' is an American film and television production company based in Los Angeles, founded in 2001 by {{W|Roy Lee}} and Doug Davison.

== ''A Minecraft Movie'' ==
It served as one of the production companies for the live-action animated film ''[[A Minecraft Movie]]'' (2025).
